reference.title: Product Name Standard Document

reference.title: GRIB 2
reference.infoUsed: GRIB2 Type of Horizontal Line, table 3.20

entry.name: Rhumb
entry.description: A line on a single bearing.

entry.name: Great Circle
entry.description: A circle formed on the surface of a sphere by the intersection of a plane that passes throught the center of the sphere. The arc between two points on the surface of a sphere is the shortest distance on the sphere's surface between them.
